alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:51AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lamar and Fannin Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 450 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bonham, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Bonham, Honey Grove, Savoy, Ector, Dodd City, Ravenna, Bonham State Park, Roxton, Trenton, Windom and Toco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for north central Texas.
